text: Luca Vecchi (born 21 September 1972 in Reggio Emilia) is an Italian politician. He is a member of the Democratic Party and he was elected Mayor of Reggio Emilia on 25 May 2014 and took office on 5 June. He has been re-elected for a second term in 2019. ==References== ==See also== *2014 Italian local elections *2019 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Reggio Emilia ==External links== * * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Reggio Emilia Category:Democratic Party (Italy) politicians
title: Luca Vecchi
